effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.

short_effect.black_white: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
